thread.section_title: Kiwi Sheepskins Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Kiwi Sheepskins | kiwisheepskins.com
thread.title: Lynne

author: Lynne
title: Lynne
text: I love New Zealand sheepskins and have several. But I wanted to get a special one for my granddaughter for her birthday. I got he double in honey. I can't possibly describe how beautiful this sheepskin is. It is soft beyond belief and the most beautiful soft color. Truly the best sheepskin I have ever bought. The service was timely and the product well packaged. I can't recommend highly enough.
